response.overview: A documentary with and about an original European avantgarde artist, Katalin Ladik, a Hungarian poet, performance artist and actress. She has been working - performing, writing, exhibiting worldwide since the 60s. She writes poems, creates sound poems and visual poems, performance art, writes and performs experimental music and audio plays. She is an experimental artist creating and performing happenings, mail art, experimental and theatrical plays. She explores language through visual and vocal expressions, as well as movement and gestures. Her work includes collages, photography, records, performances and happenings in both urban and natural environments.
response.title: Sound Cage: A Portrait of Katalin Ladik
